A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The entire build up of Star Wars: The Force Awakens (2015) was thrown out the window to create this movie. While it wasn't absolutely terrible it was filled with childish jokes and most of the movie was anti-climatic. While maintaining the beautiful visuals of The Force Awakens and the smooth storytelling of the original trilogy it could not hold up to those amazing films. This film introduced a new depth to all characters but was not used in the right way. Somehow crushing box office records with an opening weekend of $220 million dollars it did not hold up to expectations and will unfortunately not be as successful as The Force Awakens.
